ProposeEvent.title: Propose an event
ProposeEvent.lead: Are you organizing a festival, performance, or other event and want more people to know about it? Fill out the form and we will contact you. Event placement is absolutely free!
ProposeEvent.name: Your name
ProposeEvent.eventDescriptionPlaceholder: Example: On June 10-11 in Vinnytsia on the banks of the Southern Bug River, the «Strange People» active recreation festival will take place.
ProposeEvent.modalSuccess: Your request has been accepted. We will contact you within a week.
